OrgName.entry: COMMUNITY NURSING - PROVIDER SERVICES - NHS SHEFFIELD

Desc.entry: Part of the Community Nursing Services of NHS Sheffield. Works as part of the Primary Health Care Team. Services include skilled nursing assessment and treatment, health education and support for carers. Can be contacted via GP, local clinics and health centres, or by leaving a message at the above number.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Sun, 24hour (access to nursing service), premises open Mon-Fri 8.30am-5pm
